name: PianoTunes Lite
description:
PianoTunes  Lite is a simple Piano Simulator for PC.  You can enjoy playing your favourite songs on your keyboard directly without any external hardware.

  • It consists of 61 keys which can be played through a simple keyboard directly.
  • The inbuilt songs can be Auto-played.
  • You can also create your own songs by writing down the notes in the In-Built Auto-Player and replay them by saving them in an ordinary text file.
  • And many more in-game features!

There is already a guide in the game if you find yourself lost as to how Auto-Player work. 

This is the miniature version of the PianoTunes (currently in development) and can be downloaded below. This demo contains the basic functions of the main app.

This version is a great way to practice and to develop your own playstyle.

If you have any concern regarding the game contact me on twitter.
